title: Son of Saints
description: No one can outrun fate forever. But that won’t stop Lili and Viktor from trying.Lili has lost everyone she’s ever loved. She struggles to master her new supernatural powers, but a growing hunger inside of her threatens to drag her into the shadows. Can the daughter of the damned find a way to control her new dark urges?With his oldest ally gone, Viktor will spill as much blood as necessary to bring him back. But each day brings the war closer to Astryae, and the weight of responsibility soon becomes too heavy to bear alone. Soon, Viktor finds himself locked in a deadly game with a demigod as he fights to avoid the sins of his past.Their world is on the brink of destruction. Viktor and Lili race against the clock to summon help, even if no one believes what they've witnessed. But the angels and demons won’t stop until the world burns to ash.Can Viktor and Lili find a way to escape their fates? Or will their souls become casualties of war?Dive into SON OF SAINTS today, book two in the Renegade Guardians series!
author: Kyra Quinn
